data.question: What is the empirical formula of MUF-15?
What method was used to calculate the BET surface area from N2 adsorption isotherms at 77 K?
data.answer: The BET model was used to calculate the BET surface area.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of MUF-15 from experimental N2 isotherm at 77 K?
What is the selectivity of MUF-15 for C2H6/C2H4 mixture based on IAST calculations?
data.answer: Around two for all three mixtures.

data.question: What is the productivity of MUF-15 for ethylene gas starting from an equimolar ethane/ethylene mixture?
data.answer: 14 L of polymer-grade ethylene gas per kilogram of material with a single adsorption step.

data.question: Is the structure of MUF-15 unchanged after activation at 120 °C under vacuum?
Does MUF-15 exhibit higher uptake for ethane over ethylene?
Can MUF-15 be fully regenerated by placing it under vacuum for around 10–15 min?
Is MUF-15 synthesized from inexpensive precursors?
Does MUF-15 maintain its ethane selectivity in the presence of acetylene?
What is the isosteric heat of adsorption for ethane in MUF-15?
What is the pore volume of MUF-15 from experimental N2 isotherm at 77 K?
What is the predicted productivity of MUF-15 for ethylene at different operating pressures?
data.answer: The productivity of MUF-15 nearly doubles in going from atmospheric pressure to 20 bar.

data.question: Is the adsorption of ethane and ethylene in MUF-15 reversible?
Can MUF-15 selectively adsorb ethane over ethylene under dynamic conditions encountered in industrial processes?
What is the method used for calculating mixed gas adsorption isotherms and selectivity in MUF-15?
data.answer: Ideal adsorbed solution theory (IAST) was used for calculating mixed gas adsorption isotherms and selectivity.

data.question: What is the method used for DFT calculations to estimate static binding energies for ethane and ethylene in MUF-15?
data.answer: Density functional theory (DFT) with dispersion corrections using DFT-D3 method was used.

data.question: Does MUF-15 have a higher productivity for ethylene compared to other top-performing ethane-selective MOFs?
Is the separation performance of MUF-15 for ethane/ethylene mixtures superior due to its unique pore architecture?
What is the role of van der Waals interactions in the selective adsorption of ethane over ethylene in MUF-15?
data.answer: Van der Waals interactions between the ethane and the neighboring π electron clouds contribute to the stronger host–guest interactions with ethane.
